scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Correspondence series includes the letters between Thomas Merton and friends, publishers and fellow writers/philosophers. Most of the correspondence details his time spent working on various writings. The letters between Boris Pasternak discuss a similar belief in God and man despite the building Cold War in the early 1950s. also included in the series are letters between D.T. Suzuki and Thomas Merton about similarities between monastic life and Buddhist Zen philosophy.
